description: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications.
releaseNotes:
This release introduces the features, enhancements and bug fixes as detailed below:
	
	New Features

SLIDESNET-17324        Adding column in PPTX
SLIDESNET-27263        Password Protection for PowerPoint presentation
SLIDESNET-29608        Provide access to different color schemes for slides
SLIDESNET-30667        Add support for Medium Trust
 

	Investigations

SLIDESNET-33217        PresentationEx Issue with Masterslide Inheritance. (Bullets are missing and level 2 bullets alignment is lost)
SLIDESNET-33219        Analyze and estimate SLIDESNET-33206
 

	Bugs

SLIDESNET-28934        PictureFillModeEx.Tile property does not contain shape background image in PDF
SLIDESNET-29393        Improper slide thumbnail when generated in Mono 2.6.7
SLIDESNET-32025        Wrong chart colors
SLIDESNET-32091        Wrong outline rendering
SLIDESNET-32470        PPT to PDF conversion - Chinese text
SLIDESNET-32519        Hidden Kanji characters in exported PDF
SLIDESNET-32553        IndexOutofRangeException on exporting to PDF
SLIDESNET-32554        IndexOutofRangeException on accessing presentation
SLIDESNET-32950        Shape's shadow don't rendered on outer parts of shape's text.
SLIDESNET-33118        The bullet hanging and indent are lost when cloning the slide
SLIDESNET-33140        NullReferenceException on cloning presentation
SLIDESNET-33168        Cloned presentation failed to open in IPad/IPhone
SLIDESNET-33188        Table column indentation is lost on opening and saving presentation
SLIDESNET-33190        Clone issue with table border
SLIDESNET-33194        Incorrect table height in case of wrapped text in columns
SLIDESNET-33206        Aspose.Slides TableEx Negates Indentation
SLIDESNET-33242        Error during Aspose.Slides for .NET 5.9.0 installation on Windows XP
summary: Aspose.Slides is a PowerPoint management library for working with Microsoft PowerPoint files without using Microsoft PowerPoint. It allows developers to work with PPT, PPS, POT, PPTX, PPSX, POTX and ODP files on ASP.NET web applications, web services and Windows applications. It allows you to open files and manipulate the elements of the presentation from adding slides and managing variety of shapes and working with text to more complex elements like presentation protection, slide animations, charts and SmartArt rendering.The presentations can be exported to PDF, TIFF, XPS, SVG, PNG, JPEG, BMP or EMF formats.
title: Aspose.Slides for .NET
